Once a bleb ruptures and causes a pneumothorax, there is an estimated 13 to 60 percent chance that the condition will recur.",GHR,primary spontaneous pneumothorax
How many people are affected by primary spontaneous pneumothorax ?,"Primary spontaneous pneumothorax is more common in men than in women. This condition occurs in 7.4 to 18 per 100,000 men each ye
